mapper.select: select id, album_id, max(if(stat_type='0401', stat_num, 0)) as play_stat_num, max(if(stat_type='0402', stat_num, 0)) as subscribe_stat_num, max(if(stat_type='0403', stat_num, 0)) as buy_stat_num, max(if(stat_type='0404', stat_num, 0)) as comment_stat_num from album_stat where album_stat.album_id = #{albumId} and album_stat.is_deleted = 0
